description: A planned economic flow that has been scheduled or promised by one agent to another agent.

provider.description: The economic agent who commits to initiate the flow.

receiver.description: The economic agent for whom the flow is committed.

resourceClassifiedAs.description: Classification URIs or tags for the resource.

resourceQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the economic resource.

effortQuantity.description: The amount and unit of effort.

hasPointInTime.description: The planned date/time of the flow.

due.description: The date/time the commitment is expected to be fulfilled.

created.description: The date/time the commitment was recorded.

inputOf.description: Reference to a vf.planning.process this commitment is an input of.

outputOf.description: Reference to a vf.planning.process this commitment is an output of.

clauseOf.description: Reference to a vf.agreement.agreement this commitment is a primary clause of.

reciprocalClauseOf.description: Reference to a vf.agreement.agreement this commitment is a reciprocal clause of.

independentDemandOf.description: Reference to a vf.planning.plan this commitment is the independent demand of.

plannedWithin.description: Reference to a vf.planning.plan this commitment is part of.

stage.description: Reference to a vf.knowledge.processSpecification for the required resource stage.

state.description: The required state of the desired resource.

satisfies.description: References to vf.planning.intent records satisfied fully or partially by this commitment.

finished.description: The commitment is complete or not. Default false.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the commitment.
